RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile Class Reference

#include <xmlbonusfile.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlBonusFile:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Read a Bonus XML file.

It is different from the xmlBonusFileList. The xmlBonusFileList keep all the BonusFile with a string identifier and a description.

It uses TinyXML to deal with the file.
